attributes.action: THE ECONOMY CAN ONLY BENEFIT FROM DETOXIFICATION
attributes.additional_details:
When you've got a toxic Economy, YOU MUST DETOXIFY.
Are you seeking excuses not to detoxify when the Economy is in so much toxic mess? My household is already putting into effect a detoxification program & it already has some NHS backing. We plan to go viral on the internet with this GLOBAL detox program.
I can circumvent the government with this one, however, it would very prudent for the government to give this petition its' fullest backing.
ALL MUST DETOXIFY.
Healthy Regards,
